mapper.select: SELECT a.mnMmSeq ,a.mnMmId ,a.mnMmName ,a.mnMmPassword ,a.mnMmAdminNy FROM matnamMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.mnMmId = #{mnMmId} AND a.mnMmPassword = #{mnMmPassword}

SELECT a.mnMmSeq ,a.mnMmId ,a.mnMmName ,a.mnMmEmail ,a.mnMmIntroduce ,a.mnMmMobilePublicNy ,a.mnMmEmailPublicNy ,a.mnMmAddressPublicNy ,b.mnmaAddress1 ,c.mnmpNumber FROM matnamMember a LEFT JOIN matnamMemberAddress b ON b.mnmaDelNy = 0 AND b.mnmaDefaultNy = 1 AND b.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq AND b.mnmaTypeCd = 13 LEFT JOIN matnamMemberPhone c ON c.mnmpDelNy = 0 AND c.mnmpDefaultNy = 1 AND c.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE matnamMemberAddress SET mnmaAddress1 = #{mnmaAddress1} WHERE 1=1 AND mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq} AND mnmaTypeCd = 13
mapper.select: SELECT a.mnMmSeq ,a.mnMmId ,a.mnMmName ,a.mnMmDob_Year ,a.mnMmDob_Month_Cd ,a.mnMmDob_Day ,a.mnMmGenderCd ,c.mnmpNumber ,b.mnmaZipcode ,b.mnmaAddress1 ,b.mnmaAddress2 FROM matnamMember a LEFT JOIN matnamMemberAddress b ON b.mnmaDelNy = 0 AND b.mnmaDefaultNy = 1 AND b.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq AND b.mnmaTypeCd = 12 LEFT JOIN matnamMemberPhone c ON c.mnmpDelNy = 0 AND c.mnmpDefaultNy = 1 AND c.mnMmSeq = a.mnMmSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.mnMmSeq = #{mnMmSeq}
